column2: Section 48(1)  of Partition law No.21  of 1977.  The expression "omission or defect of procedure"

column1: was defined to include an omission or failure: ~

column2: to serve summons on any party; or
to  substitute  the  heirs  or  legal representatives  of  a  party  who  dies  pending  the
action or to  appoint a person to represent the estate of the deceased party for  the
to appoint a guardian ad litem of a party who is a minor or a person of unsound mind.
